name: white_facecloth
description: 100% cotton and resists fading and benzoyl peroxide stains, a common skin care product ingredient. Durable double needle side hems and low lint and bleach friendly. Oeko-Tex certified, includes no harmful substances. Create a spa experience in your own home with Threshold Performance Solid Bath Towels. These 100% cotton towels come in an array of gorgeous and fade resistant colors that coordinate easily with other bath items, helping you to design the bathroom of your dreams.
